title: IIT Patna Notification 2026 - Apply Online for Research Assistant Posts
description: The Indian Institute of Technology Patna (IIT Patna) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Research Assistant Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B.E./B. Tech in Civil Engineering can apply for the IIT Patna Notification 2026. The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, ...
